name: Harvest Slots
description:
***Now the #1 Free Farm Style Casino Game in the App Store***
Download it now!
Fun, cute, and exciting! Welcome to Harvest Slots!

Everyone has a farm dream, even slots players! In Harvest Slots, play slots to:
* Grow and customize your farm
* Fulfill orders to collect coins
* Produce goods using machines
* Experience the endless possibilities of living off the land

Gorgeous graphics, smooth animations, fantastic bonuses and atmospheric sounds guarantee a premium slots experience.
Harvest Slots is especially designed to give you the experience of Vegas slots on your iPhone/iPad.
If you LOVE slots, there's no doubt you'll love Harvest Slots.
HARVEST SLOTS—IT'S 100% FREE-RANGE FUN!

Download it now!
